title: kaliyugadoLu hari
sahitya:
kaliyugadoLu hari nAmava nenedare kula kOTigaLuddharisuvudu


anupallavi

  sulabhada muktige sulabhanendenisuva jalaruhanAbhana nene manave


caraNam 1    snAnavanariyenu maunavanariyenu dhyAnavanariyanendene bEDa 
jAnaki vallabha dasharatha nandana gAna vinOdana nene manave
    caraNam 2    arcisalariyenu meccisialariyenu duccanu nAnendene bEDa 
acyutAnanda gOvinda mukundana iccheyinda nI nene manave
    caraNam 3    mantravanariyanu yantravanariyenu tantravanariyanendene bEDa
santata dhyAnantana nAmava cintegaLillade nene manave
    caraNam 4    japavondariyenu tapavondariyenu upadeshavillavendene bEDa 
apAra mahima shrI purandara viTTalana upAyadindali nene manave
